original_text: So that changes how we think about people. We no longer use human ideas to think what they are like. At one time, we thought about Christ as humans think. But now we think about him very differently!
korean_text: 그러므로 우리가 이제부터는 어떤 사람도 육신을 따라 알지 아니하노라 비록 우리가 그리스도도 육신을 따라 알았으나 이제부터는 그같이 알지 아니하노라

sentences.original_text: So that changes how we think about people
We no longer use human ideas
sentences.korean_translation: 우리는 더 이상 인간적인 생각을 사용하지 않습니다

sentences.original_text: to think what they are like
At one time, we thought about Christ
But now we think about him very differently
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 이제 우리는 그를 아주 다르게 생각합니다
